title: Island Of Regrets
description: If you had the chance to make amends with someone from your past, would you? If you didn’t have a choice, could you? Michelle goes to sleep one night in her bed only to wake up to waves crashing on the shore. Where is she? How did she get here? How is she going to get home? She soon realizes she isn’t the only one on this Island, but did it have to be him? Frank, the one person from her past she could have done without seeing again. Can they work together to get off the Island?
author: Lee    Thompson
